extendedInfo.description: The Code of Practice for Social Care Workers App has been developed for practising social workers, social care staff and those studying to join the profession.The Code of Practice is an essential part of making sure all those working in social care in Wales are delivering services to a high professional standard. Thatâs why the Care Council is making the code available on your mobile device, so you can refer to it at any time, whether youâre in the office or out and about.The Code of Practice for Social Care Workers sets out the high standards expected of paid staff as they go about their daily work of supporting and caring for people in our society.This App is also available in Welsh â Maeâr App yma ar gael yn y Gymraeg

reviews.title: Ms S Thomas
reviews.comment: Clear and concise. Useful for all care proffessionals and care studies students at all levels. Excellent.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
